title: [Large-Scale] Analysis of the Impact of Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) on University Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, evaluating language learning experiences during ERT (Emergency Remote Teaching) through qualitative interview analysis

learning_goals: Learners will distinguish and explain at least three advantages and limitations of language learning in ERT environments.
Learners will present language learning barriers arising from digital tool usage as project deliverables.
Learners will analyze interview data to derive at least two keywords representing the educational impact of ERT.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
